entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:37 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow with risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:26 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 8:26 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
